insert into PEA_HOUSING_ALLOWANCE (HOUSING_ALLOWANCE_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, EFFECTIVE_START_DATE, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, HOUSE_ALLOWANCE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, IS_LUMPSUM_REQUESTED ) values (#{housingAllowanceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{effectiveStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseAllowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isLumpsumRequested,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PEA_HOUSING_ALLOWANCE WHERE person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND TRUNC (effective_start_date) > TRUNC (SYSDATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS rec_exists FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE PEA_HOUSING_ALLOWANCE SET EFFECTIVE_END_DATE = TRUNC(#{effectiveStartDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})-1 WHERE PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND TRUNC(EFFECTIVE_END_DATE) >= TRUNC(#{effectiveStartDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TRN.HOU_BOARDING_PARAMETER_VERSION( HOUSING_ALLOWANCE_ID , PERSON_ID , COMPANY_ID , EFFECTIVE_START_DATE , EFFECTIVE_END_DATE , HOUSE_ALLOWANCE , CREATED_BY , CREATION_DATE , LAST_UPDATED_BY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , IS_LUMPSUM_REQUESTED ) values( #{housingAllowanceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{effectiveStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseAllowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isLumpsumRequested,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
